content: The "SDHV Energy Efficiency Standards for America Act of 2010" establishes efficiency standards for small-duct high-velocity air conditioning and heat pump systems. CREDIT FOR NONBUSINESS SMALL-DUCT, HIGH-VELOCITY AIR CONDITIONING AND HEAT PUMP SYSTEMS. The amendment to the Internal Revenue Code introduces criteria for a small-duct high-velocity central air conditioning and heat pump system to qualify for energy efficiency credits. The system must meet specific energy efficiency and air leakage standards.
